about_the_game:
Please note: 2 controllers required for 2 player split screen mode.

Hot Wheels™ Monster Trucks are ready to unleash mayhem on the competition!


Hot Wheels™ Monster Trucks are ready to GO BIG and perform insane stunts while smashing and bashing through fantastical arenas in a new game that brings your favorite monster trucks to your fingertips!

Key Game Features:

• Real-world Hot Wheels™ Monster Trucks, ready to drive and perform exhilarating stunts.

• Thrilling bosses like Crushzilla™ and fan-favorite Stunt Zone by Night arena are all set in thrilling arcade gameplay!

• Head-to-Head Multiplayer challenges to see who’s got the best skills and the highest scores in the arena!

• 20 fan-favorite Hot Wheels™ Monster Trucks, each with additional skins and truly spectacular Signature Moves to perform!

• Gripping Single Player Modes: Career, Stunt, Destruction, and Boss Mode.

• Infinite replayability to perfect combos and send scores to the moon.

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 550 4GB/Nvidia GTX 750
